title: Wanted: Lower condition T206's up to $20 each
author: ruth-gehrig

posts.post_title: Wanted: Lower condition T206's up to $20 each
posts.post_content:
Looking only for "action" pose lower condition T206 cards with possible back damage and descent front centering.  I would like to stay at or under $20 a card.  
Thanks!
Michael[quote][/quote]

Keep em coming guys :)  
Thanks Paul and Adam for the lots!

Thanks Jon for the lot of 13 cards.
Still buying:)

Thanks Tom for the card.  Bumping my post because Im bumping my "up to" buy price to $20 a card.
Thanks again!
Michael
Still buying!  Thanks Scott for the beautiful, perfectly centered Snodgrass

Thanks Jeff for the lots. Much appreciated.
And yes I'm still buying. :)

Thanks Andy for the latest lot of 20 action shots.  Go ahead and let me know guys what you have. I normally buy all the action shots offered to me if they are within my posted price range and dont turn away many offers.  I'll even buy duplicates - I dont mind.  :)

Friendly bump!

Thanks to everyone who has reached out to me so far. The project I have in mind will require at least 100 more T206 "action" commons so sell me 1 or 100 ;)
Have up to $2000 available for 100 more action shots
